title: AI-Powered Threat Detection
description: An enterprise-grade platform leveraging machine learning to detect anomalies and mitigate cyber threats in real-time.

title: Red Team Simulation Toolkit
description: A comprehensive offensive security toolkit for simulating real-world attacks, designed to strengthen organizational defenses.

title: Next-Gen Portfolio Website
description: A sleek, responsive personal portfolio website featuring dark/light modes, gradient accents, and premium animations.

title: Cloud-Native Security Dashboard
description: An interactive dashboard providing live threat analytics, compliance reports, and vulnerability trends for cloud systems.

title: AI-Driven Code Auditor
description: A smart code-analysis engine that detects insecure code patterns and suggests automated remediation.

title: Zero-Trust Network Visualizer
description: A visualization tool for mapping user access flows, enforcing least-privilege policies, and monitoring zero-trust architectures.
